step_data.thought: Looking at the current state of the page, I can see that I've successfully completed the task. I previously clicked the 'Reverse Directions' button which swapped the origin and destination coordinates. The 'From' field now shows '40.7570, -73.9860' (Times Square coordinates) and the 'To' field shows '40.7830, -73.9650' (Central Park coordinates). Then I clicked the 'Go' button to calculate the new route. The directions panel shows the route details with the distance and time information. The task has been completed successfully, so I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully reversed the directions. The route now shows directions from Times Square to Central Park.')
